document_data.name: Fallen Stars Fish
document_data.mainbody: '''Fallen Stars Fish''' was a fresh fish shop located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The shop was located in the southwest section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] on the south side of [[Suldown Street]]. {{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Activities: All of the fish sold here came from the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]. Many customers were willing to pay the high prices for cleaned and gutted fish here because it was rumored that the owner used [[magic]] to ensure they were only several hours old after being caught and delivered.
